channel.title: Shops
channel.description: Where do I set the X and Y cords for my shops? This may be nooby but everyone needs help at some point, I just can't seem to figure it out. Also how do I change where you teleport to under varrock teleport?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Ok, thanks a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Full_Karils Full Karils
item.description:
@Full_Karils wrote:

My bad, open up Autospawn.Cfg and then put in this

spawn = [npc id] [x coord] [y coord] [height] [Rangex1] [rangey1] [rangex2] [rangey2] [walk type] [description][br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 06:10:23 PM[/size][hr]For emample here’s one of my shops. (You might want to put in same rangex1 y1 x2 y2, walk, and height)

spawn = 551 3254 3420 0 3254 3420 3254 3420 2 Misc Shop Keeper[br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 06:13:29 PM[/size][hr]Paste this and change the 551 to your Npc ID, 3254 and 3420 to your Coordinates, and Misc Shop Keeper to something like Sic Pure’s General Store or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure

@sic_pure wrote:

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Full_Karils Full Karils
item.description:
@Full_Karils wrote:

Find the coordinates of the new shop place you want to put the shop, Ioen up shops.Cfg and find your shop and change the X and Y coordinates to where you want the new shop location.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

I know how to do that, I want to know how to move the shops…

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Full_Karils Full Karils
item.description:
@Full_Karils wrote:

Get on your server and stand where you want your shop owner to be, then look on your run menu and it will say X: and Y: and show you the coordinates, or type in ::coordson and it will show you the coordinates. To turn off type ::coordsoff

Read full topic
